mapper.update: update tb_teacher set teacher_number = #{teacherNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacher_name = #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_gender = #{teacherGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_age = #{teacherAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_tel = #{teacherTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_qq = #{teacherQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_wechat = #{teacherWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_user_id = #{teacherUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select teacher_id, teacher_number, teacher_name, teacher_gender, teacher_age, teacher_tel, teacher_qq, teacher_wechat, teacher_user_id from tb_teacher where teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select teacher_id, teacher_number, teacher_name, teacher_gender, teacher_age, teacher_tel, teacher_qq, teacher_wechat, teacher_user_id from tb_teacher where teacher_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select teacher_id, teacher_number, teacher_name, teacher_gender, teacher_age, teacher_tel, teacher_qq, teacher_wechat, teacher_user_id from tb_teacher
